BV Pet Training Pads for Dogs and Puppies BV Pet waste management and dog behavior worry-free training product. We are helping you to maintain your home a pleasant and clean environment for your pets. 6 Layers Technology Heavy duty super absorbent core turns urine to gel. Locks the liquid in the middle layers. The standard size pad can hold up to 4 cups of liquid. Protection Lining 100. The bottom layer is made of PE plastic material. It can protect your carpet and floor from leaking.Control the odors of urine from spreading in the space.  Shop with confidence BV is continuously improving and evolving for our customer needs. Our goal is your 100% satisfaction.

6 layers.Pad dimension: 28 x 34 inches. 40-count.

About BV Pet

BV is continuously improving and evolving for our customer needs.

Our goal is your satisfaction.

BV Training Pads for Dogs and Puppies

BV Pet waste management and dog behavior training product.

We are helping you to maintain your home a pleasant and clean environment for your pets.

  • Heavy duty absorbent core can hold up to 2 cups of liquid(22″x22″,100cts); 4 cups of liquid (28″x34″, 40cts)
  • Leak-proof plastic lining and locking layers protect the floor and carpet.
  • Provide easy training and odor control with built-in attractant.
  • 2 Sizes Available: 22″x22″(100cts); 28″x34″(40cts)

Read more

Multiple Layer Protection

  1. Quilted Top Layer
  2. Dry Sheet
  3. Pet Attractant to Draw In Dog
  4. Absorbent Core Turns Liquid To Gel
  5. Locking Layer
  6. Protection Liner

Read more

Super Absorbent Core.

Heavy duty super absorbent core turns urine to gel – locks the liquid in the middle layers – to eliminate stains and odors quickly.

High Quality Top Layer.

Flash-dry technology designed to dry the surface quickly.

Leak-Proof.

The bottom layer is made of PE plastic material. It can protect your carpet and floor from leaking.

Read more

BurgeonNest Pet Supplies

Date First Available ‏ : ‎ July 15, 2020
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ HIRALIY
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08CXM511G

7 layer Protection Structure: This pet heating pad is made of soft velvet cover, watertight film, refractory wool and alloy heating wire, total 7 layer protection structure will offer your pet in gentle warming comfort
High Temperature Self-destruct Function: Heated dog pad passes certificates MET and specially has the high temperature self-destruct function. Pulsed power failure or improper use may cause focus heat, so we uses special PTC sensor to track every position’s temperature ,and the heated cat pad will automatically stop working for no more overheating
Against-chew Cord and Washable Velvet Cover: This heating pad for cats uses a bite-proof protective sleeve at the junction of the power cord and the steel cord is 2.1 meters which can withstand 5 KG pull.Quick-drying Soft cover can be take out easily and cleaned by hand
Comfortable and Warming: This heated pet mat can be used in pet houses and nests, also suitable for senior pets, arthritic pets, new born pets, pregnant pets or animals recovering from illness or injury. Help the pet (dog, cat, rabbit, etc.) to keep warm and comfortable in cold winter

BurgeonNest Heating Pad for Your Pets Provide Warmth in the Cold Winter

7 Layer Protection Structure

BurgeonNest pet heating pad is made of soft velvet, refractory wool, MET approved heating wire, total 7 layer protection structure & completely sealed, offers pet’s the most comfortable temperature range ( 86-131℉/30-55℃).

High Temperature Self-destruct Function

Our heating pads for dogs passes Certificates MET and specially has the high temperature self-destruct funtion. Pulsed power failure or improper use may cause focus heat, so we uses special PTC sensor to track every position’s temperature, and the dog heated pad will automatically stop working for prevent overheating.

PVC Waterproof Material

Cat bed heater with IP68 Waterproof liner protects from stains and odors etc. It is waterproof material won’t fade, and the material is hardwearing and won’t rip.

Dual Resistant Chew Cord

Cats usually sniff, lick and chew objects to explore everything, this cat warmer pad comes with a steel-wrapped cord to protect dog safety.

Soft Fleece Cover Easy to Clean

The soft velvet cover is removable, so you can machine wash it.

How to Clean: Remove the cover and wash it with hand or washing machine. Do not plug in until the heated pet pad is completely dry.

(as of Nov 29,2022 05:32:50 UTC – Details)

Product Description

The CT-2860 delivers stunning light, dark and rich colors with crystal clear, sharp 720p resolution on a 28-inch LED HDTV. There is a TV Stand included.

1 A Perfect Fit 2 Unmatched Support 3 Stunning Audio & Video 4 Enjoy the Action! 5 Multiple Connections

VESA Wall Mount Pattern and TV Dimensions

This TV has a Universal VESA Pattern of 100×100 which is one of the most common patterns, meaning it will fit most TV Wall Mounts that are manufactured.

VESA is a universally known measurement of TV mounts used with most TV companies around the world.A VESA hole pattern is measured in both horizontal and vertical distance between mounting holes.

For example, VESA 100 x 100 means your TV mounting holes are 100mm apart horizontally and 100mm apart vertically.

Specifications

Screen Size 28″ Display Resolution 1366 x 768 TV and Stand (WxHxD) 22.8 x 17.2 x 7.1” TV w/o Stand (WxHxD) 25.5 x 15.4 x 2.8” Viewing Angle 178° x 178° Response Time 8ms Broadcast System NTSC/ATSC/QAM Max Audio Output 2 x 8 W VESA Standard 100 x 100 mm Power Supply AC 100-240V 60Hz Power Consumption <45 W Weight 10.3 lbs. USB File Play Allows guests to play MP3 and view JPG files, as well as charge mobile devices

VESA WALL MOUNT READY – The compact, lightweight design makes it quick and easy to mount on your wall. The VESA pattern on this TV is 100×100 which is one of the most common VESA patterns, meaning it will easily fit with most wall mounts you can purchase today. You can also check out our full range of wall mounts by visiting our store.
STUNNING VIDEO AND AUDIO – Enjoy your favorite movies, shows and sports on the 28 inch, 720p, 60Hz LED Television screen which delivers stunning light, dark and rich colors. Pairing with the clarity of the screen is the stunning audio through our state-of-the-art, built-in speakers. Entertainment at the touch of a button!
FULL FUNCTION REMOTE – Control your Television on one simple-to-use remote control. Batteries Included. Easily programmable to any universal remote you may have.
UNMATCHED CUSTOMER SERVICE – Backed by the Continu.us 1 year warranty, our friendly technical support team is always here to help you. Our offices are in the USA in Eastern Time, and you can reach out to us through phone or email.
